bug.short_desc: TAB(keypress events) does not work with multiple modal windows

long_desc.thetext:
TAB(keypress events) does not work as expected for the top window with multiple modal windows opened. Step 1: Run the code Step 2: Click the button in the first modal window Step 5: press TAB (does work here!) Step 3: Click somewhere outside the second modal window Step 4: Click the textfield inside the second modal window Step 5: press TAB (does not work now!!)
Here is the code run in playground showing the unexpected behaviour. http://tinyurl.com/ogpsfoo
It seems someone triggered the same bug before http://qooxdoo.678.n2.nabble.com/no-keypress-events-on-modal-window-td7584783.html
Move open issues to RESOLVED â€“ LATER, whose last comment is older than a year.
